{"id":538169112,"lang":"cpp","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1628909248,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"155 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/538169112/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"83.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        for(auto& i:nums)if(!i)i=-1;\n        unordered_map<int,int>mp;\n        int s=0,mx=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            s+=nums[i];\n            if(s==0)mx=i+1;\n            else if(mp.count(s))mx=max(mx,i-mp[s]);\n            else mp[s]=i;\n        }\n        return mx;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
